item.title: 27.dec.25 - site is now built with 11ty!
item.description: converted my site into one that is made with the static site generator 11ty and also gave it a new refreshed look! this will make updating and creating pages MUCH easier. will keep giving it minor updates in the coming days.

item.title: 17.jun.25 - buttons
item.description: made some buttons for the fansite!

item.title: 11.may.25 - siinamota fanzine pre-order!
item.description: pre-orders opened til may 22! i'm not directly affiliated with the fanzine but i do want to give the word out since it is being organized by people i know!

item.title: 16.mar.25 - sepia record and remodel pics added
item.description: added some pics i've found online for sepia record and the remodel version

item.title: 17.nov.24 - alterour setsuna pop regular version scans
item.description: added scans for alterour setsuna pop (regular version) and uploaded it to archive.org!

item.title: 02.nov.24 - fansite vlog
item.description: recorded a vlog with my phone (snipping tool was not behaving) about the progress with the fansite so far.

item.title: 02.nov.24 - scans hyperlinks
item.description: made a minor change in the code so now you can hyper link to each album. also added bgs to pages missing them!

item.title: 02.nov.24 - info + news page
item.description: moved index paragragh about fansite to newly created info page + created a news page + shamelessly copy pasted bio written for fanlisting to the homepage.

item.title: 02.oct.24 - chatroom
item.description: added a chatroom page with a chatbox and a siinamota playlist!

item.title: 25.sep.24 - interviews now live
item.description: somewhat finished my interviews page! still need to add the archived links. just in case.

item.title: 05.sep.24 - scans page completed
item.description: moved everything from notion of for the scans!!!

item.title: 10.jun.24 - siinamota fanlisting
item.description: finished the siinamota fanlisting: i walk because i was born
